title: Selective conversion of carbon dioxide to formate using few-layer nitrogen-doped graphene on copper foam with enhanced suppression of the hydrogen evolution reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00550C, Paper
Thanthita Sasipatworakarn, Daranphop Pikulrat, Kan Homlamai, Salatan Duangdangchote, Montree Sawangphruk
This research presents a novel electrocatalyst, a three-dimensional, few-layered nitrogen-doped graphene-coated copper foam (N-GP/Cu-foam), engineered for the selective electrochemical reduction of carbon dioxide (CO2) to formate.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
